DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of multiple oral doses of CHF5074 in young healthy male volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Safety, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of CHF5074 in Healthy Young Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Subject is judged to be in good health on the basis of medical history, complete physical examination including vital signs, 12lead electrocardiogram (ECG) and standard laboratory tests. Medical history (within the last 10 years) of major cardiovascular, hepatic or renal disease. Abnormal results of liver function tests, renal function tests or thyroid tests performed at screening. Significant allergic conditions that require medical treatment Use of any psychoactive, recreational or prescription drug within the 4 weeks prior to study drug administration. Use of ibuprofen, sulindac sulfide, indomethacin, flurbiprofen within 2 weeks prior to study drug administration.
